valr
  • Home
  • Overview
  • Reference

Read a VCF file.

Read a VCF file.

read_vcf(vcf)

Arguments

vcf
vcf filename

Value

data_frame

Note

return value has chrom, start and end columns. Interval lengths are the size of the 'REF' field.

Examples

vcf_file <- valr_example('test.vcf.gz')
read_vcf(vcf_file)
